meanings.definition: a person or thing that is composed of two parts or elements
meanings.sent1: The robot was a dualin, with one part for cleaning and another for cooking.
meanings.sent2: The necklace she wore was a beautiful dualin of gold and silver.

meanings.definition: to combine or unite two separate elements into one
meanings.sent1: She had to dualin the ingredients to make the perfect cake.
